select gene_symbol from proteins where gene_symbol in (select pname from protein_enzyme where (pname in ( #{item} ) or pname_e in (#{item})) and re_type=1) or gene_symbol in (select pname_e from protein_enzyme where (pname in ( #{item}) or pname_e in ( #{item})) and re_type=1)
select DISTINCT dname,pname,`type` from drug_protein where `type`=#{type} and del=1 and pname=#{data.gene_symbol}
select DISTINCT pname,pname_e,`type` from protein_enzyme where `type`=#{type} and del=1 and re_type=2 and pname=#{data.gene_symbol}
